p: The standardized incidence rates of confirmed COVID-19 were 107 (95% CI 72–141) cases per 10 000 in the PLWH cohort and 282 (282–282) cases per 10 000 Barcelona inhabitants. The standardized incidence rate ratio was 0.38 (95% CI 0.27–0.52, P < 0.0001) indicating that confirmed COVID-19 cases in the PLWH cohort were 62% lower than those in Barcelona.
